conversion_verification.notes: The model successfully transforms the 2D plan into a 3D isometric cutaway with clear wall geometry.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent dimensional transformation with clear interior volumes and appropriate isometric projection.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout fidelity is high; rooms like the pantry and kitchen are correctly placed. Some minor inaccuracies in the foyer's internal angles and wall junctions.

interior_elements.notes: Kitchen cabinetry and major fixtures are well-represented. Stairs and bathroom fixtures are correctly positioned.

visual_clarity.notes: High contrast rendering makes the layout easy to read. Minor loss of detail in the background shading.

detected_errors.description: The foyer area geometry is slightly simplified and distorted compared to the 2D plan's complex angles.
Some window openings on the bottom-most wall (Dining Room) appear merged or slightly misplaced.

summary: A highly accurate and clean 3D conversion that faithfully reproduces the 2D layout's room configuration and interior elements.
